```{r warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(data.table)
library(magrittr)
library(zeallot)

source('code/alif/alif-utils.R')

c(data_set, matching_vars) %<-% get_data()
```


```{r warning=FALSE, comment="", echo=FALSE}

for( var_ in matching_vars$covariates ){
  cat('Variable: {var_}' %>% f)
  if( class(data_set[, get(var_)]) == 'numeric' ){
    cat('\n')
    cat('Mean: {data_set[, get(var_) %>% mean(na.rm=TRUE) %>% round(3)]}\n' %>% f)
  }else{
    cat('\nTable:')
    print(data_set[, get(var_) %>% table %>% prop.table %>% round(3)])
  }
  
  cat('\n\n')
}
```
